description: When buddy Johnny Hill busts into his place begging for help, the last thing Markie More expects is for Johnny to ask to get fucked, but for whatever reason, that's the case, and now Markie is faced with the prospect of acting on an urge he's harbored for quite some time. He's secretly wanted to show Johnny the ropes, but was always convinced his straight friend would never come around. But this is why you should never say never, as now Johnny finds himself at Markie's mercy, asking Markie to have his way with him, which Markie gladly abides. He fucks Johnny all over his bed, in every position he desires, until Johnny is ready to spit his load. When he does, Markie smiles as Johnny unleashes his first gay nut, and by the time Markie empties himself into Johnny's hole, his friend has become a full convert. Looks like this won't be the last time the two of them enjoy a little private time.Enjoy!
title: Urgent Urges
